title: Crypto Recruit
author: Crypto Recruit
content: **New shift opening for UTC 00:00 - 08:00 ONLY**This is 08:00-16:00 Philippine time  We are looking for a Telegram/Discord community manager.  This is a long term position with weekly payments.  To be eligible for this position you MUST:  - Be highly active on during work hours- Know how to deal with difficult chat group situations  - Be willing to know all about the project  - Work 8 hours per day, every day  The ideal candidate is someone who can:  - Is communicative, responsible and reliable.  - Can chat naturally with personality but knows which boundaries must not be crossed  - Is punctual- Knows about crypto To apply, fill this form

comments.author: Crypto Recruit
comments.body: Thanks for all the applications so far. The form will be open for another day before we start reaching out to candidates.

comments.body: If you still have not gotten someone to manage your community, you may want to reachoout out to cmapaign managers within the forum as thye have enough contacts to share that works across various projects. there also exists loads of marketing campaign services that also has under its sleeves, community management portfolio as part services it renders. Eithere ways, there are loads of community management resources to explore within the forum if you find your random search a challenge to meet your required conditions.
